meta.title: From SUNDAY to SATURDAY
meta.author: Sandy Weisz and Mao Reynolds
meta.message: I’m turning 49 this week. 49 is 7x7, so I’m celebrating with seven sets of seven: seven Raddles that go from the first to the seventh. We’re starting off with a set everyone knows, except for The Beatles, who must’ve forgotten this when they wrote “Eight Days a Week.”
